title: Unspecified Error Occurred: Check Logs (Please Help!)
body: I am at my {{item:3091}}  right now. I keep getting this unspecified error and have tried every possible solution i can think of to fix this issue. Any time I see someone get a response they are always told that its an error on THEIR end and not Riot's. I can't patch the live client but i can patch the PBE with no issues whatsoever. Please, dear Rito, help a poor mage out.

replies.body:
An *unspecified error* during patching can mean any number of issues could be going on. Patching issues are commonly caused by either inadequate system permissions or connection issues to the patching servers. Our [Patching Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) is a fantastic resource that consolidates a lot of these solutions that are most likely to resolve the issue.

Let me know if you continue to have patching problems after working through those steps.

An *unspecified error* during patching can mean any number of issues could be going on. Patching issues are commonly caused by either inadequate system permissions or connection issues to the patching servers. Our [Patching Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) is a fantastic resource that consolidates a lot of these solutions that are most likely to resolve the issue.

Let me know if you continue to have patching problems after working through those steps.

Have you tried running the Hextech Repair Tool yet? I had the same problem, I ran the Hextech Repair Tool and checked the Force Repatch option, and it is now updating as we speak with no connectivity issues.  Hope this helps bubs, good luck.
